initializeProxySettings

initializeLocalSecurity

protected static void initializeLocalSecurity()
                                       throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                              KeyManagementException
Use custom TrustManager that trusts everything. Moreover setup custom ProtocolSocketFactory as done in ZAP.
